```r
library(tidyverse)
library(reactable)

resgenes <- read_tsv("../data/test_dna.got")
```

# AMR genes
```r
reactable(resgenes, groupBy="Class", defaultSorted=c("Class", "Subclass"))
```

# AMR figure
```r
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(resgenes, aes(x=Subclass, fill=`Gene symbol`, label = `Gene symbol`)) +
geom_bar() +
geom_text(stat="count", size=2, position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5)) +
coord_flip()
```
